message.content:
Here is the Python code based on your specification:

```python
def return_n_smallest_chars(my_string):
    sorted_string = sorted(my_string)
    n_smallest_chars = sorted_string[:20]
    return n_smallest_chars
```
This function first sorts the characters in the string and then selects the first 20 characters. Note that this function will return less than 20 characters if the input string has less than 20 distinct characters.
